DOC.brief_summary: To confirm patient receive Star-Close vascular closure system ( VCS ) safely ambulate within 30 minute catheterization .
DOC.detailed_description: To confirm patient receive Star-Close vascular closure system ( VCS ) diagnostic cardiac catheterization safely ambulate within 30 minute catheterization .
DOC.criteria: Patients admit outpatient left heart catheterization Catheterization femoral artery Able ambulate least 20 foot Able receive StarClose Vascular Closure System Be candidate hospital discharge follow catheterization Known peripheral arterial disease Blood pressure great 180/110 Pregnant lactate Anemic low blood count Blood thin medication within 5 day catheterization Unable walk 20 foot rest Complications catheterization procedure
